articles.description: Despite using PitchCom in seven scoreless innings over the Yankees on Wednesday, Mets' Max Scherzer says the technology "should be illegal."
articles.content:
One of the game's best pitchers, today and all-time, is showing his old school mentality, has his gripes with some new-school technology.
Max Scherzer decided to give PitchCom a go for the first tim… [+2044 chars]

articles.author: Sam Fels
articles.title: It had to be Germany - Deadspin
articles.description: The only thing between the English and the women’s team's first major trophy: The Germans
articles.content: Most English fans, if not all of them, would have been nodding their heads when the final whistle of W Euro 2022s second semifinal sounded. Because it signaled that Germany would be waiting at Wemble… [+1291 chars]
